title: Playboy The Mansion
description:
Playboy: The Mansion blends state-of-the-art social simulation with traditional role-playing and empire-building gameplay. As Hugh Hefner, you build the Playboy Mansion and magazine into a dynamic cultural icon and powerful brand. Rub shoulders with stunning women and stimulating celebrities as you pursue the ultimate Playboy lifestyle. 


Construct the Mansion - The Playboy lifestyle begins at home. Will your home be a stately manor built for entertaining or a gadget lover&#039;s paradise? As your fame and wealth increase, you&#039;ll be able to add tennis courts, game houses, aviaries, even the world-famous Grotto to your estate. Just make sure to build enough bedrooms for your girlfriends. 
Live the Playboy Lifestyle - What use is a stylish pad if you can&#039;t share it with hundreds of celebrity friends? Spend the afternoon poolside with a bevy of beautiful women, and then change into your finest pajamas for an evening of decadent dancing with chart toppers, industry moguls, and all-star athletes. Will you watch a movie in the Theater Room or the Playmates on the trampoline? Life can be so cruel. 
Build Your Empire - Fame and fortune don&#039;t come easy. Manage a crack editorial staff, hustle celebrity interviews, and mold the magazine in response to a fickle market. Are readers suddenly interested in sports? Maybe it&#039;s time to host a tennis tournament! And remember, people don&#039;t just read Playboy for the articles. Each month you&#039;ll invite women to stay at the Mansion, manage their Playmate training, and oversee their sexy photo-shoots. 
Hundreds of "Celebrities" - Including actors, athletes, authors, comedians, fashion designers, models, and musicians. 
Empire Mode - Select your own goals (fame, circulation, guests, etc.) and then work over a series of months or years to achieve them. 
Campaign Mode - A dozen campaigns that chronicle Hugh Hefner and the Playboy Mansion&#039;s rise to international fame. 
The Playboy Philosophy - You&#039;re rewarded for living the good life, having a positive sexual attitude, and promoting tolerance and individual freedom.
